long_description: This Patagonia Light Flyer jacket won't let nasty weather trap you indoors. With this extraordinary lightweight, breathable waterproof shell, you can still enjoy your run. Innovative Gore-Tex(R) Active fabric offers super-lightweight, highly breathable, wet-weather protection; it's 30% lighter than other Gore-Tex laminates. Underarm zippers and vented back facilitate cooling airflow-no clamminess here! Shaped, fold-over cuffs create makeshift mittens to keep your hands toasty. Small waterproof pocket at center back stashes keys, cash and an energy gel. Reflective logos at left chest and center-back neck. Patagonia Light Flyer jacket features a slim fit.
short_description: This Patagonia Light Flyer jacket won't let nasty weather trap you indoors. With this extraordinary lightweight, breathable waterproof shell, you can still enjoy your run.
